alert.note: Alert for Foard; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 5:27PM CDT until October 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FOARD AND NORTHEASTERN KNOX COUNTIES... At 527 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Thalia to 10 miles northeast of Gilliland to near Vera, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benjamin, Truscott, Gilliland, and Vera. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
